formBuilder.fieldUnique: Accept unique value for every record
formBuilder.fieldUniqueHoverText: No two records can have the same value for this field. You will not be able to change this setting later.
formBuilder.fieldFilter: Use this field to filter records
formBuilder.fieldFilterHoverText: Filter your list of records using this field. You will not be able to change this setting later.
formBuilder.primaryFieldNameHint: This is the object's primary field that uniquely represents each record and cannot be deleted.
formBuilder.deleteFieldTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the field, {{label}} ?
formBuilder.deleteFieldMessage: This field will be deleted permanently and all associated data will be lost. Do you still want to continue?
formBuilder.deleteFieldInlineMessage: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed
formBuilder.deleteFieldMessageConversationProp: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation property? This will impact the conversations, automation and reports.
formBuilder.bulkChoiceTag: Type in each choice in a separate line.
formBuilder.subHeaderProductConvProps: Categorize and keep track of conversations.
formBuilder.fieldTypesDragDropConvProps: Drag and drop to create properties
formBuilder.relationshipManyToOneDesc: Link many records of the source object with one record of the target object. e.g Many Orders can be placed by a Contact.
formBuilder.relationshipOneToOneDesc: Link one record of the source object with only one record of the target object. e.g A Person can have only one Passport.
formBuilder.relationshipManyToOneCO: Many records of {{source}} can be associated with one record of {{target}}.
formBuilder.relationshipOneToOneCO: One record of {{source}} can be associated with one record of {{target}}.
formBuilder.relationshipManyToOneNative: Many records of {{source}} can be associated with one {{target}}.
formBuilder.relationshipOneToOneNative: One record of {{source}} can be associated with one {{target}}.
formBuilder.customizeWidgetModalHint: Select upto 5 fields to display on the widget.
formBuilder.freePlanFieldAddDisabledHeader: Did you know you can add custom fields?
formBuilder.freePlanFieldAddDisabledMessage: Custom fields are available from Growth plan and above.
formBuilder.noCreatePermissionFieldAddDisabledHeader: You do not have permission to create new properties
formBuilder.noCreatePermissionFieldAddDisabledMessag: Please reach out to your admin for more details.
formBuilder.dependentDropdownMessage: Dropdown choices will be categorized based on the indentation (use the ‘tab’ key to indent choices).If a choice is repeated in the same category, it will be skipped.

errors.minimum: Enter a minimum of one choice
errors.formErrors: Please fix the errors and continue
errors.useOnlyEnglishChars: Use only english alphabets, numbers and underscore (_) for internal name.
errors.fieldNameExists: There is another field with the same name in this form. Please use a different name.
errors.deleteDropDownChoice: Deleting a choice will impact all related records

maximumLimits.filterable: At most {{count}} fields (excluding lookups) can be selected to filter records in the list view.
maximumLimits.unique: At most {{count}} fields can be marked as unique.
maximumLimits.fields: Reached the maximum limit of {{count}} fields. Delete an existing field to create a new one.
maximumLimits.lookups: Reached the maximum limit of {{count}} lookup fields. Delete an existing lookup field to create a new one.
maximumLimits.maxCharsWarning: You have reached a maximum limit of {{count}} characters.
maximumLimits.maxChoiceOptionsWarning: You have added maximum limit of {{count}} choices.
maximumLimits.maxCharsChoicesWarning: Choice name should not exceed {{count}} characters.

sections.addTooltipDescription: Sections are conditional fields that show up based on the rules you have defined.
sections.sectionCreatedForAllChoices: The dropdown property is not available for adding new sections
sections.sectionDescription: Sections are conditional fields that show up based on the rules you have defined.
sections.emptySection: Drag and drop fields to add to this section
sections.deleteSectionContent: Are you sure you want to delete this section? This will delete the conversation properties within the section and will impact the conversations, views, forms, automations and reports.
sections.disableChoiceOption: This option is used to create a section and cannot be edited

errorMessages.DROPDOWN: Dropdown fields cannot be added into sections
errorMessages.MULTI_SELECT: Multi Select  Dropdown fields cannot be added into sections
errorMessages.DEPENDENT_FIELD: Dependent fields cannot be added into sections
errorMessages.RELATIONSHIP: Lookup fields cannot be added into sections
errorMessages.REQUIRED: Fields marked as required cannot be added into sections
errorMessages.DEFAULT: Default fields cannot be added into sections
errorMessages.MAX_LIMIT: Sections cannot contain more than 15 fields
